sentence: Ron DeSantis, Republican senators Ted Cruz, Rick Scott and Marco Rubio, and Representatives Matt Gaetz, Jim Jordan, Lauren Boebert, Madison Cawthorn and Marjorie Taylor Greene in building buzz for the star of the circus, former President Donald Trump.
title: The Myth of Instant Gratification

sentence: North Carolina GOP Rep. Madison Cawthorn blasted the Left for dredging up photographs of him wearing women's lingerie, saying the newly resurfaced photos amount to a desperate attempt to hurt him.
author: Misty Severi
title: Cawthorn slams Left for unearthing 'goofy' photos of him in lingerie
